何分にも: (なにぶんにも) - anyway; anyhow; at any rate; after all
何卒: (なにそつ) - please/kindly/I beg of you/if it pleases you; by all means/without fail
何呉となく: (なにくれとなく) - in various ways
何呉と無く: (なにくれとなく) - in various ways
何回も: (なんかいも) - time and time again; many times; a number of times
何奴も此奴も: (どいつもこいつも) - everybody (usu. negative nuance); everybody; every last one of them; all
何年: (なんねん) - what year; how many years
何年生: (なんねんせい) - what grade (in school)
何度: (なんど) - how many times?; how often?
何度か: (なんどか) - several times; once or twice
何度でも: (なんどでも) - any number of times
何度も: (なんども) - many times over; often
何座: (なんざ) - what star sign? (astrology); what constellation?
何彼と: (なにかと) - one way or another
何心なく: (なにごころなく) - without any special thought
何心無く: (なにごころなく) - without any special thought
何所: (いどこ) - where/what place; how much (long, far)/what extent
何才: (なんさい) - how old?; what age?
何故か: (nazeka) - de alguma forma, por algum motivo, sem saber por quê
何故かと言うと: (なぜかというと) - because; the reason why is
何故だか: (なぜだか) - somehow; for some reason; without knowing why
何故なら: (なぜなら) - because; the reason is; if you want to know why
何故ならば: (なぜならば) - because; for; the reason why is ...
何方: (なにざま) - (どちら is polite)  which way/which direction/where; which one (esp. of two alternatives); who
何方もどっち: (どっちもどっち) - neither is great; both are bad; both are to blame
何方付かず: (どっちつかず) - gray area; grey area; unclear area; uncertain
何方道: (どっちみち) - anyway; either way; one way or the other
何日: (なんにち) - what day; how many days
何日か: (なんにちか) - some days; several days
何日も: (なんにちも) - for many days; for several days
何時か: (いつか) - sometime; someday; one day; some time or other; the other day; in due course; in time
何時かしら: (いつかしら) - (from いつか知らぬ)  before one knows; before one becomes aware of; unnoticed; unawares
何時かは: (いつかは) - (more emphatic version of 何時か)  sooner or later; in due time; in due course
何時からか: (いつからか) - since some time or another; since who-knows-when
何時ごろ: (いつごろ) - about when; how soon
何時しか: (いつしか) - before one knows; unnoticed; unawares
何時ぞや: (いつぞや) - once; some time ago
何時だって: (いつだって) - always; at any time
何時でも: (なんどきでも) - (at) any time; always; at all times; whenever
何時なりと: (いつなりと) - (at) any time; always; at all times; whenever
何時なんどき: (いつなんどき) - at any time; every moment
何時の間にか: (いつのまにか) - before one knows; before one becomes aware of; unnoticed; unawares
何時の間にやら: (いつのまにやら) - unawares; unnoticed; before you know it
何時まで: (いつまで) - how long?; till when?
何時までも: (いつまでも) - forever; for good; eternally; as long as one likes; indefinitely; no matter what
何時まで経っても: (いつまでたっても) - no matter how much time passes
何時も: (いつも) - always/usually/every time; never (with neg. verb)
何時もながら: (いつもながら) - as always; as ever
何時もの通りに: (いつものとおりに) - as always
何時も通り: (いつもとおり) - as always; as usual
何時何分: (なんじなんぷん) - at what time?; when?
何時何時までも: (いついつまでも) - indefinitely; for a long time
何時何時迄も: (いついつまでも) - indefinitely; for a long time
何時迄: (いつまで) - how long?; till when?
何時迄も: (いつまでも) - forever; for good; eternally; as long as one likes; indefinitely; no matter what
何時頃: (いつごろ) - about when; how soon
何月何日: (なんがつなんにち) - what date?; what's the date?; when?
何条: (なんじょう) - what street? (esp. in Kyoto and Sapporo); what article? (in a law); (the 条 in 何条 is an ateji) how can?/cannot possibly/there is no way
何枚: (なんまい) - how many thin flat objects?
何某: (なにぼう) - certain person/certain amount/Mr So-and-so; I (personal pronoun)
何様: (なにさま) - (often used sarcastically) person of importance/a somebody; absolutely/certainly/to be sure
何歳: (なんさい) - how old?; what age?
何気なく: (なにげなく) - unintentionally; calmly; inadvertently; innocently
何気に: (なにげに) - inadvertently/for no special reason; truthfully/unexpectedly; after realizing/without knowing
